title: How to thank customers for feedback - Quora

response.answer_text: You have to give them some sort of incentive for example a discount voucher in next purchase or an automatic entering into a competition. I don’t do surveys or feedbacks unless I get paid. I told my landlord if I found three items out of order inside his property per month I deduct 20% on his rent as he Is using me to do his Property inspections. I had Several correspondence with his attorney and I stand by my decision, they refuse to take me to court. Point I am making -you have to pay people or offer them something of value for their time.
